input.content:
Please split a Chinese character into two characters, if possible. Answer in this format: original character - first divided character second divided character. Return in a left-right, top-bottom sequence. e.g.
欣=斤欠
航=舟亢
烫=汤火

If the character is separated more than two characters, e.g. 鑫, return ">2". e.g. "鑫=>2"
If the character cannot be separated, e.g. 一，于，上 return "standalone". e.g. "一=standalone"
No explanation. No bullets at the beginning. No numbering.
